name: Aethra
title: Tribune
abilityWindow: When a player loses a planet
abilityText: Exhaust this card and the owner of that planet gains two trade goods

name: Zenith
title: Warden
abilityText: Once per ground combat, when one of your infantry is destroyed, you may place it on any other planet you control.

name: Korrin
title: Elder
abilityText: During this game round, you can ignore your Limited Presence restriction. At the end of the round, purge this card.
